text: When i edit the document with the kupu in the default publication, i use the function of the image, at this time, the picture that i hava inserted can show normally, but when i click the save button, the picture that i hava inserted can not show normally. I find that the path of the picture is not correct. For example, the correct path is '', but when i click the save button, the path become '', so the picture can not show normally. Could someone help me?
Kupu will not be supported in future versions.
